hero.title: Hi, I'm Felipe Pereira
hero.description: I'm a Full-Stack Developer with over 1 year of experience building modern web applications using React, React Native and Node.js. I have hands-on experience with databases like MongoDB and MySQL, and I'm certified in Google Cloud. I also work with AWS services, and I actively use Python and TypeScript to develop scalable, high-performance solutions across the stack. Reach out if you'd like to learn more!

frontend.title: Frontend Developer
frontend.desc: I am a Frontend Developer skilled in building responsive, user-friendly websites. I focus on creating visually appealing interfaces and ensuring optimal performance across devices and browsers, while leveraging the latest frontend technologies and best practices.

backend.title: Backend Developer
backend.desc: I have experience in developing fast, efficient backend systems and APIs, ensuring optimal performance and scalability.

ui.title: UI Designer
ui.desc: I have conducted design research, crafted intuitive visual interfaces, and implemented responsive designs for optimal user experiences across all devices.

experiences.0: Software development support, with: Python, Java, TypeScript, JavaScript, React e Node.js
I worked with software development, from bug fixing to building new features. Technologies used: React, Node.js, MongoDB, MySQL, Python, and TypeScript.
